code:
(define/contract (min-increment-operations nums k)
  (-> (listof exact-integer?) exact-integer? exact-integer?)
  (let ([n (length nums)])
    (define (max-in-window start end)
      (let loop ([i start] [max-val (list-ref nums start)])
        (if (> i end)
            max-val
            (loop (+ i 1) (max max-val (list-ref nums i))))))
    (define (required-increments)
      (let loop ([i 0] [total-increments 0] [max-incs 0])
        (if (>= i (- n 3))
            total-increments
            (let* ([window-max (max-in-window i (+ i 2))]
                   [diff (- k window-max)]
                   [incs (if (< diff 1) 0 diff)])
              (loop (+ i 1) (+ total-increments incs) (max max-incs incs))))))
    (required-increments)))
